Unlock your Skills with our Crevasse Rescue Courses!

During our 2-day intensive course, learn how to identify hazards, build anchors, and safely rescue a fallen climber. Our course combines modern crevasse rescue techniques and effective teaching styles to leave you feeling empowered to explore the mountains. We pride ourselves on our flexible itinerary which we can easily adapt based on learning styles, speeds, and personal goals.

Climbing Instruction: Unleash Your Inner Rock Climber!

Join us for a day of learning-focused climbing in the mountains. Our expert guides will teach you the ropes, from basic techniques to advanced skills, ensuring you gain the knowledge and confidence to apply those skills to your own recreational climbing in the future.
